    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public static JDOM getFile​(java.lang.String path)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Method that receives the String path where the file is located and returns a JDOM containing its lines.
        Parameters:
        path - String that contains the URI of the file.
        Returns:
        Stream of String if the file is readable, null Stream otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.jdom2.JDOMException

      • deleteDirectory

        private static void deleteDirectory​(java.nio.file.Path path)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Method that deletes a directory and EVERYTHING INSIDE OF IT.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to be erased.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if path can't be accessed.

      • createDirectory

        public static java.nio.file.Path createDirectory​(java.lang.String uri)
        Creates a directory given a String URI. If the directory exists, it asks the user if the directory should be erased. The method returns null if the user doesn't want to erase the directory.
        Parameters:
        uri - String containing the URI.
        Returns:
        Path of the new directory if operation was successful, null otherwise.

      • getStation

        public static java.util.Optional<Station> getStation​(java.lang.String city,
                                                     java.lang.String stationFile)
                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                     org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Gets a Station from a csv given a String containing its name. File is read using the "windows-1252" charset.
        Parameters:
        city - String containing the station name.
        stationFile - String URI of the csv file where station data is stored.
        Returns:
        Optional of Station.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.jdom2.JDOMException

      • getMeasuresDataOfStation

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<org.jdom2.Element> getMeasuresDataOfStation​(Station station,
                                                                                  java.lang.String file)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                  org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Method that reads from a data xml file filtering its lines by station code.
        Parameters:
        station - Station whose data we want to obtain.
        file - String containing the URI of the csv data file.
        Returns:
        Stream of String containing the lines filtered by station.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.jdom2.JDOMException

      • getMeasures

        public static java.util.List<Measure> getMeasures​(java.util.stream.Stream<org.jdom2.Element> dataOfCity)
        Method that parses a Stream of String containing data lines into a List of Measure. If the stream is empty, the list is returned empty.
        Parameters:
        dataOfCity - Stream of station data.
        Returns:
        List of Measure

      • getMagnitudes

        public static java.util.List<Magnitude> getMagnitudes​(java.lang.String file)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      org.jdom2.JDOMException
        reads magnitudes from xml document and returns them as list
        Parameters:
        file - xml file
        Returns:
        list of magnitudes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading fails
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - if there's xml parsing problems
